title: Coronavirus in South Africa: The lull before the tsunami?
description: South Africa sees an unexpected slow-down in the daily rate of infections, writes Andrew Harding.
content:
Image copyrightGetty Images
During the past fortnight South Africa has seen a dramatic, and unexpected slow-down in the daily rate of coronavirus infections. 
Health experts are warning that it is far too early to see this as a significant development, and … [+6543 chars]
